front.title: Alert-Info URNs for the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP)

abstract.t: The Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) supports the capability toprovide a reference to the alternative ringback tone (RBT) forcaller, or ring tone (RT) for callee using the Alert-Info header.However, the reference addresses only the network resources withspecific rendering properties. There is currently no support forpredefined standard identifiers for ringback tones or semanticindications without tied rendering. To overcome this limitations andsupport new applications a family of the URNs is defined in thisspecification.
